# cli

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

> A module with bin

## Installation

Install `cli` using [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/):

```bash
npm install --save cli
```

## Usage

### CLI usage

```bash
$> cli --help

Usage...
```
